Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

valkey-io/valkey

open source in-memory key/value datastore, forked from Redis, supports many data structures and plugins

View on index

Related repos

  • Redis-like data store with SQL backend, ACID transactions, and Go support
  • multithreaded Redis fork focused on high performance
  • In-memory key-value store using Python’s orjson
  • cloud native LSM key-value store with searchable compression and distributed compaction
  • disk-based key-value store in Zig inspired by Bitcask
  • Code editor built with Rust and Freya
  • Redis-compatible distributed database with ACID transactions, multi-threaded performance, and auto-tiered storage
  • RocksDB — embeddable key-value store library for persistent data storage
  • Configuration management tool using key/value stores and templates
